channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA1/SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Network equipment version upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 29, 21:00 UTC  -  Nov 30, 00:00 UTC

Aug 24, 17:44 UTC

End time : 30/11/2023 00:00 UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Baremetal] - Debian-8-based rescue system (rescue64-pro) removal
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 3, 08:00 UTC  -  Nov 3, 10:50 UTC

Aug 2, 14:39 UTC
Scheduled - Start time: 03/10/2023 08:00 UTC
End time: 03/11/2023 10:50 UTC
Service impact: The Debian-8-based rescue system (rescue64-pro) will no longer be available after 03/10/2023
Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to remove the Debian-8-based rescue system (rescue64-pro) for all Baremetal products.
Customers should start using the new Debian-10-based rescue system (rescue-customer).
The old Web interface is no longer present on the new version.
Please follow this procedure to troubleshoot hardware problems: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-dedicated-servers-hardware-diagnostics?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0043506

item.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R808R05
item.description:
Sep 11, 16:39 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/09/2023 15:56 UTC
End time :11/09/2023 16:20 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack R808R05 were temporarily unavailable
Root cause : Cooling system issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 11, 16:09 UTC
Identified - Start time : 11/09/2023 15:56 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack R808R05 are temporarily unavailable
Root cause : Cooling system issue
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem

End time : 11/09/2023 09:08 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 11, 07:36 UTC
Update - Most of the servers affected are back up and running.
We are continuing to work on the remaining servers.

Sep 11, 06:25 UTC
Identified - Start time : 11/09/2023 07:13 UTC
Service impact : Servers in rack 45F05 are currently unreachable.
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.

item.title: [Worldwide][Dedicated server] - Video/KVM
item.description:
Sep 11, 09:00 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 25/07/2023 18:30 UTC
End time : 06/09/2023 08:00 UTC
Root cause : Incident caused by a software issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Aug 10, 15:20 UTC
Update - Workaround : When PXE starts up, you can press the escape key to boot directly on the disk and bypass the malfunction.
We are continuing to investigate this issue

Aug 8, 13:57 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/07/2023 18:30 UTC
Service impact : Video quality via KVM may be degraded for servers running a Windows or WinPE OS. This malfunction only impacts ADV3 servers with a B550D4U-2T motherboard and does not prevent the server from operating normally.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Root cause : A failure on a cooling module.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix.
An update will be issued as soon as significant progress is made.
